::Dachande::

    "Vulois? Is that you?" He asked. "Looks like the mind mel=
d might have worked. Can you read out signatures? If not I'll give you the =
cordinates."
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Alloran2@... 
  To=
: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, November 15, 2000 9:16 PM
  Subjec=
t: Re: Dark Lavacons comin' in!


  OOC: Logo says that shes terrible at ma=
le characters, so she gave me 
  Starscream and Vulois.  If any of you dont=
 beleive me, E-mail her. Im 
  basically guessing about there whereabouts, =
so bear with me.  tell me if 
  anythings wrong.  None of the memories in t=
his are moding. they really 
  happened. 

  :::Vulois/Starscream::: 

  ::=
Vulois was in the cave, thinking about things.  He had regained his old 
  =
memory, and thought about everything that happened in his life on this worl=
d. 
   He remembered when he first came, a messenger from the matrix.  Evil=
.  He 
  contacted Predacons to join his group.  The first to answer his ca=
ll was 
  Soundwave.  Soundwave came to his mountain lair and became a TM3.=
  Soon 
  Vulois and Soundwave became very good friends.  battera also join=
ed him.  
  After he failed his treachery against Hell Beast, he built an e=
mbassy and 
  turned over a new leaf.  he decided to strive for peace.  By =
this time, 
  Battera had joined the Destrons along with Cybershark.  Sound=
wave was left in 
  his quarters, thinking that Vulois had died.  Vulois co=
ntacted his three 
  friends and they came promptly to him.  he then assign=
ed them factions for 
  peace talks.  Battera went with the Maximals and! b=
! ecame almost part of them.  
  Cybershark had very little luck with the P=
redacons.  Soundwave went to the 
  Alliance.  While Soundwave was there, V=
ulois went into a meditation state, 
  and when he woke up, he discovered t=
hat Soundwave had been brutally killed by 
  the Alliance.  many things hap=
pened after that.  he trained a young bot named 
  Child, the Skyscorchers =
joined him, Eagle Eye died, GuardienAngel and 
  AngelNemises were destroye=
d, and many other strange things.  Leading up to 
  him faking his own deat=
h and joining the Alliance.  Now he didnt know how he 
  feeled.  He opened=
 up his comm:: 
  Vulois: Battera, Cybershark, would you please come to my =
coordinates so we 
  can discuss some things? 
  --------------------------=
----------------------------------------------------

  -------------------=
-------------------------- 
  ::Starscream was flying around, wondering wha=
t had happened to his comrades.  
  Soon his energy signature detector went=
 off:: 
  Computer: Kitkat's energy signature detected. 
  ::He flies down =
and transforms to robot mode.  he walks up to Kitkat:: 
  Starscream: Kitka=
t!  Im sorry for disapeering like that, but, WHAT HAS 
  HAPPENED WHILE I W=
AS GONE? 
        eGroups Sponsor
